thread.title: LIVE: Watch This Pregnant Giraffe Welcome Her Baby into Our Dark and Troubled World
thread.title_full: LIVE: Watch This Pregnant Giraffe Welcome Her Baby into Our Dark and Troubled World - VICE

author: River Donaghay
title: LIVE: Watch This Pregnant Giraffe Welcome Her Baby into Our Dark and Troubled World
text:
A pregnantgiraffe is preparing to give birth to a calf inside her pen atAnimal Adventure Park in Harpursville, New York, and the zoo is graciously livestreaming the whole thing right nowso you can watch one of the world's goofiest mammalspop out a baby and be distractedbriefly from the growing hellscape that is our current world.
Thegiraffe, April, has been pregnant for the past 15 months, and will finally give birth any minute now. The baby giraffe is expected to besix feet tall and weigh around 150 poundswhen it's born, and April will raise it for six to ten months before the calf is moved to a new home.
Almost 40,000 people were tuned into thestream at time of publishing, watchingApril pace around her pen as the baby's father, Oliver, watches from his pen next door. Youtube briefly suspended thestream Thursday morning due to "nudity & sexual content," according to WGRZ , but it's now back up and running so thousandsof people can witness the miracle oflife or whatever.
Take a break from crafting up your not-shitty protest sign and bask inthe beauty that isthe animal kingdomright now.
